website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy, 2-tiered bamboo steamer is perfect for steaming dim sum, fish, vegetables, and more.
pros: Stainless steel bands protect the bamboo against burning and also hold it together so that it doesn't splinter when the wood expands and contracts during use
Includes 2 pairs of chopsticks and 50 wax paper steamer liners
cons: The bamboo parts may become splintery after many uses, and for some, the interior rings detached  and were difficult to replace

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying that I am a professional chef. This is an amazing buy!!!! Don't hesitate. Just do it. It comes with two pairs of chop sticks and paper liners. My mind was blown. (We just use cabbage leaves or banana leaves in the restaurant.) It is built well and sturdy. Handle is super secure. Buy this steamer and then buy a dumpling book. Treat yo-self.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I can't believe that I wasn't aware of it before... I made salmon several times since the time of my purchase and every time is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and it worked great. Each steamer tray help over 10 dumplings and ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it worked great. Each steamer tray help over 10 dumplings and it was easy to clean. If you leave the dumpling, or whatever you are steaming, on the liners for too long after you remove them from the steamer, the dumplings will stick to the liner. You will have to put them back in the steamer and allow the steam to un-stick them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived super early and I immediately used it to make some steam buns. It locks in the steam well and has enough space to really put stuff in there. I also liked that it came with paper to put underneath your food. The bamboo makes it smell a little funny while you’re cooking, and that wasn’t something I had thought about when purchasing, but I would absolutely purchase this again. I’m very happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would be giving it a 4 star if not ...
customer_reviews.text: I would be giving it a 4 star if not for the fact that it started splintering and pieces of the bamboo began breaking off around 2 days after I used it. I assume this bamboo wasn't treated, so I guess it was to be expected. It functions decently as a steamer, just worried about durability, since the bamboo is that flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sijia Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in conjunction with a stainless steel ring to use it over a pot. The parchment circles that came with it were and excellent bonus! This makes my dumplings taste so much better then just steaming them in my rice cooker, and it also helps everything cook faster and provides me more space to make multiple batches at a time. I don't use it every day, but I do use it enough that I can confidently say it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I like that it still gives the fragrance of the bamboo ...
customer_reviews.text: My old bamboo steamer fell apart after a few runs, it started splitting from the top seam. When I saw these metal reinforced steamer baskets I was very intrigued. It has held up really well in the multiple times I've used it to steam dumplings, baos, xlbs, etc. I like that it still gives the fragrance of the bamboo but with the reinforcement of the metal so it won't fall apart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lu

customer_reviews.title: .Nice steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new steamer! I used it the other night to steam some vegetables and they came out perfectly. No more mushy veggies! I can't wait to try making dumplings I like the reinforced tiers and cover. It has some weight, so stays in place on my pots better than the un-reinforced steamer did.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Middlemiss

customer_reviews.title: The best steamer ever
customer_reviews.text: I streamed pot stickers once and vegetables another time. I was pleased to see round parchment inserts included so your food doesn't stick to the steamer. (I didn't know those existed!) It came with chopsticks too. I have had bamboo steamers before but not like this. The metal bands are pretty and functional This is really high quality, with great instructions on how to keep it nice. I am thrilled to have it! I use it on my iron cast fry pan with the metal ring from Helen Chen. Greatly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: a grateful reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes great food!
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I am now addicted to steamed carrots!!!! I love that I can use it directly in a wok or on top of a pot without a ring. It feels so nice to use and fills the kitchen with yummy smells. My only issue was one of the inner bamboo rings deformed, still very usable (its mine, I'm NOT sending it back!) Thats the only thing not to adore about it
customer_reviews.author: RN and EMT-I

customer_reviews.title: Efficient steamer. Good for steaming everything..
customer_reviews.text: I liked the steamer as it does it’s job when steaming. Very sturdy and efficient. The only reason i gave 4 stars is that once the bamboo steamer get steamed and moisture soak in the bamboo will expand and causes one of the tier to elevate since they didn’t have extra space. I would recommend to the manufacturer to give a little space during assembly since it’s dry bec once it’s use during steaming the bamboo floor will expand.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. Looks pretty well made for the price. Item ships from China. The only negative I can think of is that the bamboo steamer actually SMELLS like a Chinese restaurant. If it was for myself I wouldn't have cared, but that is why it only gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Windytulip

customer_reviews.title: oh my goodness!
customer_reviews.text: The food comes out amazing with this steamer, I bought the metal ring to use it on top of my pot and the steamer gets hot quickly and cooks fast. My first dish was steam golabki they came out amazing in about 15 minutes the clean up was amazingly easy it took a day to air dry. Enjoy, this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Basket portion looked fine. Steamer racks poorly cut and arrived cracked, missing pieces. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, delicious dumplings
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bamboo steamer. The liners it comes with make it a no-mess cooking process as well. The chopsticks it comes with are meh, about the quality you get at a takeout place. It has a wonderful bamboo smell as it steam, however, I haven't noticed it carry over into the food I cook in it. When I first got it, I rinsed it completely, let it dry, then steamed it empty and maybe that helped. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Good product for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my steam bun. However, it seems to be smaller than what I expected. It only fits four buns. Moreover, you will need a pot that is smaller than this steamer, or you need to buy a piece of metal to fit it in. When it come to cleaning. Since you better have steam sheet, otherwise you will have a bad time cleaning it up. On the other hand, it is a good steamer for small family or beginners of Chinese foods. It does come with the chopsticks, but it is not as long as the picture showing. In the end, it does not fit my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Callen La

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful and hardly any steam leaks out
customer_reviews.text: very beautiful and hardly any steam leaks out, very well fitted. I ordered the metal ring as well to set it on, so you can use different size pots. I hate that most electronic rice steamers are plastic. I use this to steam my veggies, and cook my rice in the water below. One negative is the beautiful metal banding does get super hot, use mittens to remove
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and getting worse
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged and I opted for a refund rather than a replacement. Ive been trying to use it but it keeps getting worse. Probably a nice product if it arrived in acceptable condition, however, it didn't and I don't see this product as lasting very long in this condition
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel like a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet but they seem like good, quality steamers. I particularly like the metal bands at the top and bottom of the steamers. This will prevent burning if the water runs too low. I have a set of steamers that don't have the metal bands and when the water gets low in the wok the sides burn. Will update once I use them
customer_reviews.author: Happy snapper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from 3 weeks of travel across Asia and was craving the cuisine. Having just learned to like the taste of dim sum and dumplings, I couldn't wait to get a steamer. After careful review of all the options, we decided on this one and wasnt disappointed! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic feel for dumplings but Instant Pot won for me
customer_reviews.text: This may be easy to clean but after reading the “instructions” I was scared to do anything to it. The bottom started to warp a but on the third use so maybe user error with too much water. Liked the parchment paper too that it came with. Honestly, it was easier and dumplings turned out better with Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.author: E. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo steamer works great
customer_reviews.text: We have used this style bamboo steamer for decades - too bad they don’t last forever. The VonShef unit seems sturdy and we hope it stays that way!
customer_reviews.author: Richielj

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time tonight and it did a great job. The second shelf steams considerably slower than ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time tonight and it did a great job. The second shelf steams considerably slower than the first, so bear that in mind when planning your meal. The included parchment paper makes cleanup a snap - I'm glad I ordered an extra packet. With the additional 11-inch ring, this fit perfectly over my pasta pot. We'll be using this often!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Chatterton-Luuring

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice quality. Sturdy! My only problem is that it is a bit shallower than normal steamers so hard to fit any big bun into it.
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this steamer a few times, and it appears to still be in great condition. The metal rings are a nice touch to add extra durability, so hopefully this steamer doesn't fall apart as fast as bamboo-only ones. I do wish it was possible to buy more of the steamer baskets without the lid, so I could steam a whole stack of dumplings for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Rinn

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I used it to make steamed dumplings, and it worked nicely. I’ve since used it to reheat rice, vegetables, and other food, instead of using a microwave. Reheating rice in this leaves the rice really moist! It’s easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Oriental bamboo steamer. Good quality easy to use
customer_reviews.text: what is not to like. These are a good size has a good depth to each layer and works out very well for steaming. First time I've ever used a product like this and I was very impressed and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William Waldron

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use made dim sum as soon as it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Purkis

customer_reviews.title: Best bamboo steamer I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best bamboo steamer I ever owned. Check out there pot adapter...frees up the Wok and fits just about any size saucepan.
customer_reviews.author: William Yaremchuk

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware does not come with bowl pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty bummed that it didn’t come with the bowl that is in the picture along with everything else in the picture. A bit deceptive. The chopsticks and the steamer look really nice though.
customer_reviews.author: JJJM777

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It worked but was very cheaply made, no surprise though, you get what you pay for. It does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Nice steamer with plenty of room for a meal for a few people. Included paper did not go well with dough as it stick to bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love it, and will
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a Grandson, andwhen he called, to thank me, he said this is really top draw, I love it, and will. get so much use out of it. I asked the. quality. and he said that it was professional .
customer_reviews.author: Norma Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has held up so far!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great for all my homemade and store bought dumplings! This is my first and only bamboo steamer but I am happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Very well build, Cleans up easily
customer_reviews.text: Very nice steamer. I have used this multiple times and have not been disapointed. Made my own dimsum , stemmed store bought frozen dimsum, and steamed some fish. I Place mine over a wok. Cleans up really well. Sturdy bamboo with a steel band around the trays. 2 trays, 10 " diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Y. M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Look very nice. But poor quality! I only used it twice for steaming vegetables. two tiers are already out of shape as attached photos. I won’ t be able to stack them up.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer mainly to make pork steam buns and did so very successfully. I've also used this to steam green beans as well as other vegetables. it's pretty intuitive to use and a good addition to my growing kitchen. Plus the two added pairs of good quality chopsticks turn out to be pretty useful too. The non-stick sheets aren't necessary so I don't know what I'm going to do with those.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ibes

customer_reviews.title: Better than most. But not the best
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Although the bamboo kinda warps a bit and that's obnoxious to force it to fit. Also the parchment paper it comes with sticks to the buns and is totally useless.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my steam basket for several years and I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I use them a lot now
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I use them a lot now. One drawback is that the aluminum edging is very thin and poorly attached. They look kinda tacky and cheap, and I almost wish they weren't there. There were also a lot of small splinters along the bamboo pieces; looks like they weren't polished much at all.

customer_reviews.title: ... and the sheets and chopsticks it comes with are great additions.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, but not really worth over $15. Also, does not come with the sauce cup shown in the picture, which I was a little disappointed about. But oh well.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the inside layer is just as bad, while the chopsticks are made better the the ...

The quality of the inside layer is just as bad, while the chopsticks are made better the the steamer basket!!! This is not to say by any means the chopsticks are made decently but at least they haven't split or are broken. look at the pictures I attached.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, excellent cooking tool

The steamer was easy to use, a breeze to clean, and my first effort at shrimp and sugar snap pea shumai cooked beautifully. I purchased this model thinking that the metal bands would make it last longer and I look forward to using it often for Asian-style cooking. Great product, affordable price, and quick delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! My first project was shrimp and pork potstickers, and they turned out better than when I used a metal steamer. I also like the 50 free wax liners and 2 pairs of chopsticks that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

product_meta.title: VonShef Premium 2 Tier Bamboo Steamer with Stainless Steel Banding Includes 2 Pairs of Chopsticks and 50 Wax Steamer Liners, Perfect For Steaming Dim Sum Dumplings Buns Vegetables Fish Rice, 10 Inches
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC ASIAN COOKING: Create Healthy Chinese Cuisine at Home.
MULTI-USE: Ideal for Steaming Vegetables, Rice, Fish, Dim Sum.
NATURALLY WOVEN BAMBOO: Retain Moisture, Nutrients, Color, and Flavor.
STACKABLE BASKETS: 2 Tiered Steamer Allows Multiple Items to be Steamed at One Time.
CHOPSTICKS AND LINERS INCLUDED: Includes 2 Pairs of Bamboo Chopsticks and 50 Wax Steamer Liners.
